content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Herr Heine. I am looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. Considering the size of the apartment and its location, I was hoping we could start the negotiations at €850 per month. Is this a price that would be acceptable to you?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, €850 per month is an interesting starting point. While it is lower than my initial expectations, I am open to considering it. Would you be willing to pay a bit more to secure the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Herr Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am currently a student and need to keep my expenses within a certain budget. €850 is the maximum I can afford at this time. However, I am very interested in the apartment and would like to make it work if possible. Is there any wiggle room on your end?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, as a student, I understand that you have financial constraints. Let's find a solution that works for both of us. How about this: if you can pay €875 per month, I'll be willing to include all utilities in that price. No additional costs for you. Would this be a more acceptable arrangement?
name: Heinrich Heine
